summary: Email exchange between law enforcement personnel regarding scheduling a discovery call for the Maxwell/Epstein case. The sender, a former investigator now working as a legal instructor, provides availability to discuss case information with AUSAs.

persons.name: AUSAs
persons.context: Assistant U.S. Attorneys who requested a call to ask questions and ensure no lingering case information exists.

connections.description: Both are named together in the 'Maxwell/Epstein case' as subjects of the investigation and discovery deadlines.
AUSAs are involved in the prosecution of JE as part of the Maxwell/Epstein case.
AUSAs are involved in the prosecution of GM as part of the Maxwell/Epstein case.

events.title: Discovery call scheduling
events.description: Email exchange to schedule a discovery call between law enforcement personnel and AUSAs regarding the Maxwell/Epstein case.

events.title: Proposed discovery call
events.description: A call is proposed for 11am to discuss case information with AUSAs.

keyFacts: The email discusses scheduling a discovery call for the Maxwell/Epstein case, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in October 2020.
The sender previously worked on the initial and subsequent investigations of the case and is now a legal instructor.
The purpose of the call is for AUSAs to ask questions and ensure no lingering case information exists.
